GetUserName() GetUserNamenetwork.user.UserService network.user.UserServiceGetUserName
string network.user.UserService.GetUserName ( )[inline]
Retrieves the username from a remote API endpoint.
Returns
A string representing the username retrieved from the API.
This method creates an HTTP GET request to the specified API endpoint to fetch the username associated with a user ID. It uses an instance of HttpRequestFactory to create the request and executes it asynchronously. The method waits for the response to complete before logging the result and returning the username as a string. Note that this method blocks the calling thread until the asynchronous operation is complete, which may lead to performance issues in a UI context. Here is the caller graph for this function:
